New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi returned career-best figures of 4-22 in Pakistan's win over Bangladesh.
Muhammad Rizwan scored 32 runs for Pakistan in the match.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi struck early with Litton Das' dismissal for 10.
Shakib Al Hasan was dismissed via a lbw decision after a review.
Pakistan managed to chase down the target with 11 balls to spare.
Shan Masood and Mohammad Haris formed key partnerships to guide Pakistan to victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen Shah Afridi expressed happiness over the team's performance and recovery from injuries.
Pakistan bounced back from previous losses to secure their spot in the semi-finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a virtual quarter-final following the Netherlands' shock win over South Africa.
Pakistan's victory marked their progression to the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup.
